channel.title: R on Jian CUI Ph.D.
channel.description: Recent content in R on Jian CUI Ph.D.

item.title: A simple web tool for compound condidates selection
item.description: This Demo is established with R shiny to looking for some possibilities in drug discovery. Since there is a lot of information need organizing during the analysis and is difficult to perform in a relatively simple way.

item.title: R programming for Foundations of Computational Biology V.1
item.description: This handout was generated for Foundations of Computational BiologyCOBB 2009. It introduced the basic R operation and some advanced tricks that help to run your script more efficiently.
